content:
CANCELLATION POLICY 
 1. Deposit & Cancellation policy 
 Before 1/12/2022: No Deposit 
 From 1/12/2022: Deposit Fee is as followings: 
 - Deposit Fee: 500.000VND/ pax 
 - Cancellation made before 48 hours prior to the tee time will not be charged any penalty. 
- Cancellation made from 24 hours to 48 hours prior to the confirmed tee time and no- show will be charged 50% of the total deposit. 
 - Cancellation made within 24 hours to the confirmed tee time and no- show will be charged 100% of the total deposit. 
 2. Block account 
 In case no-show three times in a roll, your account will be locked for three months.
